description:
If you’re looking for dress to keep you comfy while appreciating fall’s beauty, the search is over. Paired with leggings and boots, this luxuriously soft Turtleneck dress has a casual, cool weather style that’s hard not to love. Made from an incredibly soft midweight Tencel blend that feels great and has a gentle drape.

  • Super soft Tencel™ and orgonic cotton blend is light, breathes well and has just enough spandex for a comfortable stretch
  • Turtleneck delivers scarf-like warmth that you will want to snuggle into
  • OEKO-TEX 100 certified fabrics add confidence that what's next to your skin is made with the utmost care
  • Relaxed fit has a casual, all day comfort
name: Bonnetier Turtleneck Dress - Women's
